name: Talisman: Origins - Beyond the Veil
detailed_description:
Are you ready to step Beyond the Veil?

This add-on for Talisman: Origins adds a whole new book to the game, containing 5 exciting chapters to play through. The expansion introduces a never before playable character, the Grim Reaper. Previously a very powerful NPC in The Reaper expansion for Talisman, it’s now up to you to decide who lives and who dies. Death is no longer the end, as this DLC also brings back the ability to traverse the lands of the dead from the Realm of Souls expansion for Talisman: Digital Edition.

BEYOND THE VEIL includes:

  • A new playable character
  • 5 chapters of brand-new story content
  • 5-10 hours of new content
  • New challenges to overcome
  • New achievements to complete

short_description: Step Beyond the Veil in this add-on to Talisman: Origins! Play as the Grim Reaper and decide who lives and who dies in a whole new campaign.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x600 resolution
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On board

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: x86 AMD 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
